label: DayOfWeek
comment:
The day of the week, e.g. used to specify to which day the opening hours of an OpeningHoursSpecification refer.

Originally, URLs from GoodRelations were used (for Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday plus a special entry for PublicHolidays); these have now been integrated directly into schema.org.

enumerationMembers.label: Friday
enumerationMembers.comment: The day of the week between Thursday and Saturday.

enumerationMembers.label: Monday
enumerationMembers.comment: The day of the week between Sunday and Tuesday.

enumerationMembers.label: PublicHolidays
enumerationMembers.comment: This stands for any day that is a public holiday; it is a placeholder for all official public holidays in some particular location. While not technically a "day of the week", it can be used with OpeningHoursSpecification. In the context of an opening hours specification it can be used to indicate opening hours on public holidays, overriding general opening hours for the day of the week on which a public holiday occurs.

enumerationMembers.label: Saturday
enumerationMembers.comment: The day of the week between Friday and Sunday.

enumerationMembers.label: Sunday
enumerationMembers.comment: The day of the week between Saturday and Monday.

enumerationMembers.label: Thursday
enumerationMembers.comment: The day of the week between Wednesday and Friday.

enumerationMembers.label: Tuesday
enumerationMembers.comment: The day of the week between Monday and Wednesday.

enumerationMembers.label: Wednesday
enumerationMembers.comment: The day of the week between Tuesday and Thursday.
